mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TLT_USE (ID,CAT_WT,POTTY_TYPE,GAS,IN_TIME,OUT_TIME,USE_TIME) VALUES(#{id},#{cat_wt},#{potty_type},#{gas}, TO_DATE(#{in_time}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(#{out_time}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(#{use_time}, 'hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: SELECT ID,CAT_WT,POTTY_TYPE,GAS,IN_TIME,OUT_TIME,USE_TIME FROM TLT_USE WHERE ID=#{id} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'MM/dd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'MM/dd') ORDER BY IN_TIME
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM TLT_USE WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'MM/dd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'MM/dd') AND ID=#{id}
